titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of November 8 - November 14, 1987 as "National Community Care Week".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 10/15/1987--Introduced. Designates the week of November 8 through November 14, 1987, as National Community Care Week.
